article: Last week, it was a delightful surprise to meet my old school teacher. I call her my old school teacher as if she were the _ one who taught me in school. There were many others too. But the truth is that she is the only one that has stayed in my _ so long, and she is the very one that' s been worth keeping. I felt _ and was showing her off as my own teacher. _ that she was my teacher was a lot of fun. Maybe she also felt a little _ to have one of her own students like me. Although my respect for her has always been _ --- I know that if I ever _ a book, her name will go on the dedication page--- actually I've never expressed to he what an impact she has had on my life. Without her, I wouldn't be what I am doing. Maybe there would have been some reading, but no love for _ . She provided the _ platform where I exhibited all my mind's contents-- with questions I had no _ to answer. It seemed that she couldn't answer them either-- for all those important questions in life _ have answers -- but she took a personal interest in what I had to say, not just as a(n) _ but as another individual. She _ me to ask more questions, which made my mind larger and larger until it felt like the entire world would be able to make a home in my head. She open my _ . She actually showed me that there might be something worth _ with the world. Sometimes I could feel so much excitement in her comments on what I wrote, about which I used to feel _ . In fact, her _ for my writing helped me attend to what I wrote as well. I found what I'm happy doing in life because of the confidence she allowed me to have. I guess I'm _ that way.
